Stages.Text: A key bridge on the trade route to South Finmer was destroyed last night. Pending repairs, travel is impossible.
Acting mayor Canbell should be informed of recent developments. Visit her in the town hall.
Acting mayor Canbell has arranged for you to travel south with a traveling merchant. Wait for repairs to finish, then find him near the town's south gate.
You arrived in South Finmer, the last known location of Mayor Iso. Find her.
After asking around, your leads on Iso are running thin. Perhaps some time in South Finmer's local tavern might let you overhear something.
Iso will visit the local healer in South Finmer after sundown. Make sure you're there.
